1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Detective Walker and Thomoson investigate the disappearance of Skye Hamilton, as Christy, Jace and Ariana try to get on with their lives as normal but guilt and secrets always expose themselves as no lies stay buried for long.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Ariana retells her story of events but are they true or is she just trying to protect herself?

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Jace retells his story of events but are they true or is he just trying to protect himself?

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Christy retells her story of events but are they true or is she just trying to protect herself?

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: In the season finale, judgment day has come as Detective Walker and Thomoson try to figure out which of the three suspects is telling the truth. Will all buried lies be dug up in time to discover who's guilty?

imdb.plot outline: Christy Clarke, a medical student is madly in love with boyfriend Jace Adams, the mayors son. What Christy doesn't know is Jace is actually cheating on Christy with Ariana Davis, Christy's enemy. Along with best friend, Skye Hamilton, the nice rich girl, the gang find themselves in a tangled web of lies when a party ends in disaster and murder. Throw in Detective Walker and Thomoson who are on the hunt to find out who's innocent and discover much more than you bargained for....for all Buried Lies must be dug up.
imdb.title: Buried Lies
plot: A Youtube Mini Series which sees three friends end up in a tangled web of lies, crime, romance and 3 completely different stories of the events.::Dylan Cohen
